books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers is called to investigate in Trippton, Minn., when a local bank's president is found dead in a nearly frozen river.
books.name: DEEP FREEZE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT

books.author: by Jo Nesbo
books.description: The Oslo detective Harry Hole searches for a serial killer who builds snowmen outside the homes of his victims.
books.name: THE SNOWMAN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Tragedy and unexpected dangers come to life at a Napa Valley winery.
books.name: FAIRYTALE

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: A Miami lawyer solicits an Army veteran to go on a secret mission to recover $60 million stashed away in Cuba.
books.name: THE CUBAN AFFAIR

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Det. Napoleon Dumas investigates a murder and uncovers clues about personal events that happened 15 years ago.
books.name: DON'T LET GO

books.author: by Tom Hanks
books.description: Seventeen short stories, each incorporating a typewriter, by the Academy Award-winning actor.
books.name: UNCOMMON TYPE

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: A pair of lovers find themselves on opposite sides of a conflict while Queen Elizabeth fights to maintain her throne.
books.name: A COLUMN OF FIRE

books.author: by Stephen King and Owen King
books.description: Women who fall asleep become shrouded in mysterious cocoons while the men battle one another.
books.name: SLEEPING BEAUTIES

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Jennifer Egan
books.description: The first female diver at the Brooklyn Naval Yard during World War II tries to understand why her father disappeared.
books.name: MANHATTAN BEACH

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Stieg Larsson's character Lisbeth Salander seeks to uncover the secrets of her childhood.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO TAKES AN EYE FOR AN EYE
